sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import '../styles/style.css' const ContactUs: React.FC = () => { return

Contact Us

Address: Tanzania

Phone: + 1235 2355 98

Email: bekabakari900@gmail.com

Website yoursite.com

Contact Us

Your message was sent, thank you!
} export default ContactUs
